#Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Functional Analyst Contract

##Title
Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Functional Analyst Level 3 services for Comptrollership Systems Modernization Division (CSMD) staff

##Reference Information
- **Solicitation Number (NUMÉRO DE SOLICITATION)**: 1000250292
- **Amendment Number (NUMÉRO EN SIMPLE)**: 2
- **Publication Date (DATE DE PUBLICATION)**: 2023-07-04
- **Tender Closing Date (DATE DE CLÔTURE DE L.APPEL D.OFFRES)**: 2023-07-26T14:00:00

##Description

Health Canada requires the services of a professional consultant with expertise as an SAP ERP Functional Workflow Analyst and Instructor to support various cross-functional SAP workflow initiatives, such as Procure-to-Pay process, the Item Review Framework approach and others as they arise.

##Objective
The objective of this requirement is to have an SAP ERP consultant deliver efficient and effective workflow services across all SAP modules, including the Portal, to meet the advanced system requirements of the various stakeholders supported by the Comptrollership Systems Modernization Division (CSMD). This will assist the SAP team in providing ongoing operational support and enhancements to the system, while following SAP Workflow best practices.

##Scope of Work
The Contractor will provide design and development of workflow-related solutions through enhancements. They will support these initiatives and provide training/guidance to CSMD staff. Task Authorizations (TAs) will be issued against the Service Outline Agreement to support various Health Canada initiatives.

##Sourcing Methodology
This requirement is an **RFP against Supply Arrangement** for a Tier 1 consultant. Qualifying candidates will have expertise as an SAP ERP Functional Workflow Analyst and Instructor.

##Security Requirements
- **Common PS SRCL #6 Applies**
- **Designated Organization Screening (DOS)**
- **Resource reliability**

##Tender Evaluation Criteria
**Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price** will be used to evaluate the tender response.

##Contract Details
- **Initial Contract Period**: 360 days
- **Option Period 1**: 220 days (April 1, 2025 to March 31, 2026)
- **Option Period 2**: 220 days (April 1, 2026 to March 31, 2027)

##Contract Procurement Entity
Health Canada, Comptrollership Systems Modernization Division
